headerDisplay: This plugin creates a fridge or freezer alarm using a Sonoff TH10 WiFi switch, running Tasmota firmware, with a DS18B20 temperature sensor attached and installed within the appliance.

th10IpAddress.title: Sonoff TH10 IP Address
th10IpAddress.description: IP address of the sensor device.

alertTemperature.title: Alert temperature (in Celcius)
alertTemperature.description: The recorded temperature at which to set alarm state. Recommended -9 for freezers and 10 for fridges.

pollInterval.title: Interval (in seconds) to poll the status
pollInterval.description: The TH10 can take a while to respond and it's not really necessary to check at intervals less than one minute.

alertCount.title: Alert State Count
alertCount.description: Number of consecutive over-threshold readings that must be made before triggering the alert state in HomeKit (reduces alerts from normal use i.e. opening the door).

th10StatusLocation.title: Sonoff TH10 status URL
th10StatusLocation.description: URL to retrieve current status from device.

hysteresis.title: Hysteresis
hysteresis.description: The amount by which the recorded temperature must fall to clear an alarm state (in degrees Kelvin/Celcius).

form.title: Advanced Settings
form.description: Leave these at defaults unless troubleshooting.
